cookieSwitchText.message: Never store my browsing history on

cookieSwitchHint.message: By erasing your browsing history, Alora will help you reduce ads and clean the cache and cookies related to this site on your computer.

trackerSwitchText.message: Blocking trackers and ADs on all sites

trackerSwitchHint.message: Alora blocks trackers and other malicious scripts from following you around online to collect information about your browsing habits and interests.

noTracker.message: There are no tracker on this site!

trustSite.description: trust site button on tracker tab

distrustSite.description: distrust site button on tracker tab

siteListHint.message: You are currently erasing the browsing history from the following site(s):
siteListHint.description: hint text above site list on manage tab

siteListRemove.description: remove button text of site list on manage tab

siteListAdd.description: add button text of site list on manage tab

siteListDomainExists.description: error message that domain already exists on manage tab
